titleStmt.title: Tamiḻneṟi Viḷakkam 24.
Experimenting with formatting for the final edition.

witness.expan: A Critical Edition and Study of Akapporul Vilakkam [ante correctionem]
A Critical Edition and Study of Akapporul Vilakkam [post correctionem]

body.head: Commentary
body.p: pirivuṇarttutaṉ mutal ākap peyarntōṉ kūṟṟīṟākac collap paṭṭaṉa cēy iṭaip pirivām eṉṟa vāṟu.

div.p: eṉpatu aḻuṅkātu celavu kuṟitta talaimakaṉukkut tōḻi colliyatu.
eṉpatu kalvi viḷakkuvāṉ pirivar eṉa veḷip paṭa vuṇarttiyatu.
eṉpatu pakai taṇippāṉ pirivar eṉa vuṇarttiyatu.
eṉpatu vēntaṟ kuṟṟuḻip pirivar eṉa vuṇarttiyatu.
eṉpatu poruḷ vayiṟ pirivar eṉa vuṇarttiyatu.
eṉpatu pirivar eṉpatu kēṭṭa talaimakaḷ āṟṟāḷ āyt tōḻikkuc colliyatu.
eṉpatu āṟṟāḷ āya talaimakaṭkut tōḻi pirivu nayappac colliyatu.
eṉpatu pirintu cellun talaimakaṉ ṟērp pākaṟkuc colliyatu.
eṉpatu talaimakaṉ iṭaic curattut talaimakaḷai niṉaintu neñciṉait teḷittuc ceṉṟatu.
eṉpatu talaimakaṉ aṟiyāmaṟ pirinta viṭattut talaimakaḷ āṟṟātu colliyatu.
eṉpatu talaimakaḷ āṟṟāmaikkut tōḻi yāṟṟāḷ āyiṟṟu.
eṉpatu āṟṟāḷ āya tōḻikkāṟṟuval eṉpatu paṭac colliyatu.
eṉpatu tōḻi yāṟṟuvippāṉ ṟalaimakaṉai iyaṟ paḻittatu.

standOff.note: I assume UVC was influenced by the phrase illamoṭu miṭainta in NA376 though he does not provide a footnote so it is difficult to know for sure. illoṭu sill makes sense, so I have retained the MS reading.

In lieu of an apparatus, I simply provide the full transcription of the poem as found in the palm-leaf MS. The text in the paper copy of the MS and print editions are identical. It is not clear how UVC arrived at this text. Perhaps the palm-leaf has deteriorated in the years since he acquired it.
